hera.wallet

Interface AccountHoldable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Wallet
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractWallet, NaiveWallet, SecureWallet, ServerKeyStoreWallet

    @ApiAudience.Public
 @ApiStability.Unstable
public interface AccountHoldable
